body: It would be great to enable the Discussions feature for this repository. It would allow me to ask questions or ask for help, things that are not issues perse.

comments.body: We have the [Question label](https://github.com/temporalio/sdk-php/issues?q=sort%3Aupdated-desc+state%3Aopen+label%3A%22Question%22) for questions, as well as many other channels where you can ask a question, like [Slack](https://t.mp/slack) or [Forum](https://community.temporal.io/tag/php-sdk)

title: Enable `Discussions`
